examples.korean: For example, you can ask Siri to call a taxi. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 예를 들자면 시리에게 택시를 불러달라고 할 수 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: For example, you can ask Siri to call a taxi. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: That means you can talk to Siri, and Siri will talk back. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 즉 시리에게 말을 걸 수 있고 시리는 대꾸를 할 수 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: That means you can talk to Siri, and Siri will talk back. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You can ask Siri many different questions, and Siri will answer you. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 시리에게 여러 가지 질문을 하면 시리는 여기에 답을 한다. Neungyule
examples.english: You can ask Siri many different questions, and Siri will answer you. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: So if there's nothing else, end of conversation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 자, 다른 게 없으면 회의를 마칩시다(얘기를 끝냅시다) User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 안빈낙도(nakb****)

examples.korean: Member for Mid-Worcestershire descended into a flash flood of emotion and, as we know, flash floods wreck and do not build. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 중부 우스터셔 주 의원은 갑작스런 감정의 홍수 속으로 빠져들었는데, 갑작스런 홍수란게 본래 건설적이지 못하고 파괴적이다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 장사빈(joll****) Hansard
